snippet: The most comprehensive survey of the work of this designer, a core figure in mid-20th-century avant-garde circles, is on display at the Migros Museum.
abstract: Migros Museum, Zurich, exhibit Xanti Schawinsky features survey of works, many shown for the first time, by the relatively little-known Bauhaus artist and theatrical designer.
lead_paragraph: The most comprehensive survey of the work of this designer, a core figure in mid-20th-century avant-garde circles, is on display at the Migros Museum.

headline.main: Archive of Xanti Schawinsky, Bauhaus Artist, Is Exhibited in Zurich
headline.print_headline: The Forgotten Man of Bauhaus, Almost
